content: introducing the victory pumpkins mosaic blanket strip featuring a row of pumpkins this strip is perfect for adding seasonal flair to any blanket throw or even a festive table runner whether you re new to mosaic crochet or looking to expand your skills the victory pumpkins strip offers both a fun challenge and a cosy addition to your fall décor watch the free video tutorial here 2 you may sell the items that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 3 sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 4 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches 1 https //elimeedesigns--stardustmedia thrivecart com/cottagecore-mystery-mosaic-blanket-ebook/67246462b87c5/ 2 https //youtu be/j2vsqdgjpag 3 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 4 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
